metadata.title: CVE-2015-6730 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in thumb.php in MediaWiki before1.23.10, 1.24.x before 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the f parameter, whichis not properly handled in an error page, related to "ForeignAPI images."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-1').
